column5: Traveling between shows, Hank Williams was found dead in the back seat of his baby blue Cadillac when his driver pulled over for gas and food. A monument to mark this sad occasion was erected in front of the town library, close to the site of the gas station.
column6: A humble plaque marks the site where the country music legend was found dead in his Cadillac.
column8: WV-16 Oak Hill, West Virginia United States
column14: ['Aretha Franklin Subway Tributes', 'Massacre of Glencoe Monument', 'Burke and Wills Monument', 'Michael Jackson Denkmal (Michael Jackson Memorial)']
